programme.title: Jamie Oliver: Seasons
programme.sub-title: Endless Summer: From Grilled Panzanella Salad to Sour Cherry Tart
programme.desc: Jamie ends summer with crispy duck in a rich plum sauce & roast potatoes. Grilled peppers star in panzanella. Garden zucchini become Mediterranean rice. Sweet finale: sour cherry frangipane with crème fraîche.

programme.title: Jamie Oliver: Seasons
programme.sub-title: Stuffed Salmon Celebration and Almond Custard Tart
programme.desc: Jamie snazzes up some spuds with wild garlic pesto, creates a broad bean mezze, rustles up a beautiful spring salad and honours rhubarb in a luscious custard tart with almond brittle.

programme.title: Jamie Oliver: Seasons
programme.sub-title: Summer-y Sweet Pea Risotto and Slow Roasted Pork
programme.desc: Jamie celebrates summer with roasted fennel pork & gratin, oozy pea risotto, and rainbow slaw chicken wraps. He shares edible hanging basket tips. The feast finishes with stunning mackerel on sun-dried tomato couscous with colorful beets.

programme.title: Jamie Oliver: Seasons
programme.sub-title: Buddy's Strawberry Rice Pudding and Summer Tomato Chicken Bake
programme.desc: Jamie cooks a chicken sheet pan dinner with early tomatoes, potatoes and chorizo. Buddy helps pick strawberries for quick jam rice pudding. The summer feast ends with spicy shrimp skewers with homegrown chillies and a refreshing cucumber gazpacho.

programme.title: Jamie Oliver: Seasons
programme.sub-title: Endless Summer: From Grilled Panzanella Salad to Sour Cherry Tart
programme.desc: Jamie ends summer with crispy duck in a rich plum sauce & roast potatoes. Grilled peppers star in panzanella. Garden zucchini become Mediterranean rice. Sweet finale: sour cherry frangipane with crème fraîche.

programme.title: Andrew Zimmern's Wild Game Kitchen
programme.sub-title: Grilled Clams Casino and Garlicky Clam Pizza
programme.desc: Andrew Zimmern celebrates cherrystone clams with two show-stopping recipes. He prepares classic grilled clams casino with pancetta, then pushes boundaries with an innovative grilled pizza topped with clams, garlic, chiles, and cheese.

programme.title: Andrew Zimmern's Wild Game Kitchen
programme.sub-title: Elk Tenderloin Tostadas and Grilled Rack of Ribs
programme.desc: Andrew Zimmern highlights lean elk, first crafting classic Mexican tostadas with grilled tenderloin, avocado, and homemade salsa macha. Then, he grills a whole rack of elk, serving it with creamy colcannon, tarragon emulsion, and rosemary charcoal.

programme.title: Andrew Zimmern's Wild Game Kitchen
programme.sub-title: Southern Shrimp Skewers and Asian Crispy Rice
programme.desc: Andrew Zimmern grills beloved shrimp in two distinct ways. He starts with jumbo shrimp and country ham skewers glazed with sweet-hot pepper jelly. Then, he creates Asian-inspired shrimp, served over crispy battle rice and a complex sambal.

programme.title: Andrew Zimmern's Wild Game Kitchen
programme.sub-title: Wild Boar Feast: Chorizo with Mussels and Whole Roasted Leg
programme.desc: Wild boar takes center stage! Andrew makes chorizo with mussels, preserved lemon & white wine. Then, he slow-roasts a whole leg over fire, served Southern-style with pickled cherries, glazed onions & mustard sauce.

programme.title: Barbecue: Life of Fire
programme.sub-title: The Legend of Louis Mueller's Dino Beef Ribs
programme.desc: Pat visits his close friend Wayne Mueller, third-generation pitmaster of Louis Mueller's BBQ, to learn the ins and outs of his famous dino beef ribs.

programme.title: Barbecue: Life of Fire
programme.desc: Pat visits Edgar Victoria, known for bringing the street foods of Mexico City to Nashville, to do some live fire cooking out in nature as they prepare one of his favorite dishes - skirt steak tlayuda.

programme.title: Hardcore Carnivore
programme.sub-title: Whole Hog BBQ with Pitmaster Pat Martin
programme.desc: Jess teams up with legendary West Tennessee pitmaster and whole hog expert Pat Martin to cook a hog overnight and enjoy a special cut of beef from Australia.

programme.title: Hardcore Carnivore
programme.desc: In windy Canyon, Texas, Jess visits West Texas A&M, where she interacts with a cloned cow, participates in a blind meat tasting experiment, and helps teach us how to break down a carcass into the cuts we see in the grocery store.

programme.title: Jamie Oliver: Seasons
programme.sub-title: Crispy Pork Noodles and Cheesy Chard Cannelloni
programme.desc: Jamie celebrates rhubarb in a lip-smacking sauce, heroes spinach in a silky goat's cheese risotto and marries vibrant basil with chard in a crowd-pleasing cheesy spring cannelloni.

programme.title: Struggle Meals
programme.desc: It's dinnertime and breakfast is on the menu this week. These affordable breakfast specials are hearty enough for dinner, and so delicious they may even taste better after dark. Grab a fork and dig in for the most important meal of the day!

programme.title: Struggle Meals
programme.desc: Send your taste buds on a first class food tour without even leaving the Struggle kitchen! Frankie whips up his favorite regional specialties from five destinations, making them as authentic as possible while sticking to his budget.

programme.title: Struggle Meals
programme.desc: At a loss when your pantry is empty? With these recipes, you can walk into any grocery store with only $7 and walk out with everything you need for an entire meal. Because yes, you can whip up a nutritious meal at an affordable price!

programme.title: Struggle Meals
programme.desc: Everyone knows Frankie can't live without pasta, but this week he shares his favorite Italian recipes that don't require any kneading. Add these simple, delicious dishes to your weeknight menu to complete your Italian dish repertoire.

programme.title: Struggle Meals
programme.desc: Join Frankie to learn the ins and outs of using every part of a chicken, as he demonstrates how to maximize the value and minimize waste. By cooking smarter, you'll have three delectable recipes to last you the whole week.

programme.title: Struggle Meals
programme.desc: Cancel the pizza delivery, it's time to save money and build your pies from scratch. With three different pizza styles, you're bound to find one that satisfies your craving without digging into your wallet.

programme.title: Struggle Meals
programme.desc: When the temps are soaring and turning on your stove or oven is not even an option, Frankie's no cook meals will blow you away. Enjoy refreshing, nourishing dishes that will help keep you cool all summer long.

programme.title: Struggle Meals
programme.desc: It's field trip day, and Frankie shows off his best handheld lunches perfect for leisurely days at the park, the beach or the pool. These sturdy meals are made to travel and only get better with time.

programme.title: Struggle Meals
programme.desc: Soak up summer with the ultimate outdoor cookout, featuring smashburgers, pasta salad and scrumptious sweets. These classic dishes can be prepared indoors or out, making them the perfect recipes for backyard dinner parties on warm summer nights.

programme.title: Struggle Meals
programme.desc: When you're craving a quick nutritious meal, say no more to throwing cash down the gutter for overpriced takeout bowls! Frankie recreates three restaurant favorites for a fraction of the cost, sparing your bank account without sacrificing flavor.

programme.title: All Up In My Grill
programme.desc: Big Daddy Dale Talde shows you how to marinate, prep, & grill up the biggest and best steaks out there. From a Hanger Steak with Salsa Verde to a Ribeye with Ginger Chili Relish, and tops it all off with the father of all steaks… The Porterhouse.

programme.title: All Up In My Grill
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde pulls out all the stops for this daddy-sized dinner. He grills up prime rib with herb & horseradish crust, lobster & chili sauce American, charred green beans with garlic tahini, and cheddar-stuffed parker house rolls.

programme.title: All Up In My Grill
programme.sub-title: Grilled Loco Moco and Huli Huli Chicken
programme.desc: The options are plentiful when Chef Dale smothers grilled Loco Moco with a mushroom gravy, salty and sweet Huli Huli Chicken with charred pineapple, and healthy scoops of Tuna Water Chestnut poke or mac salad.

programme.title: All Up In My Grill
programme.sub-title: Feast of Killer Crab & Perfect Pork Belly
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde prepares a finger food feast with char grilled chili crab, spiced adobo potatoes, grilled pork belly, & sofrito stuffed branzino all served on a bed of rice over banana leaves. Call your friends - this is a feast that will feed many!

programme.title: All Up In My Grill
programme.desc: Comforting and familiar but full of island flavor, right from the grill! Chef Dale roasts pork shoulder with chicharrones, steamy coconut rice and pigeon peas finished with frozen coconut rum drank with a charred banana.

programme.title: All Up In My Grill
programme.sub-title: Deluxe Dogs with Crusted Corn & Potatoes
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde puts a modern spin on a classic All-American cookout with his loaded hot dogs, spiced smashed potato salad, chorizo & corn nut crusted corn, and bangin' banana pudding pops. Sparklers out for this spread!

programme.title: All Up In My Grill
programme.sub-title: Wok Cooking On A Charcoal Grill
programme.desc: Anything is possible with a wok and a good ol' charcoal grill, at least if you're Chef Dale, who throws together a heavenly spread of fiery eats, from drunken meats, stir fried veggies, and stir fried noodles.

programme.title: All Up In My Grill
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde gets his beach vibes going with a grilled shrimp & lobster cocktail, clams with lemon breadcrumbs, a killer grilled king crab with burnt citrus butter, and a chilled mango frozen daiquiri. Don't you dare miss this beach party!

programme.title: All Up In My Grill
programme.desc: Ribs are a lifestyle, and Chef Dale's living it up with smoky beef shorties in tangy red wine glaze, Miami-style pork ribs dripping in bacon-guava BBQ, spicy baked beans, and killer key lime caramel cones. Grab some napkins!

programme.title: All Up In My Grill
programme.desc: Chef Dale is flipping burgers into art - gooey mac & cheese burgers, fancy French patties topped with melty bucheron cheese, crispy parm-truffle fries, and peanut butter fudge ice cream sandwiches. Get hungry.

programme.title: Jamie Oliver: Fast & Simple
programme.desc: Jamie cooks a speedy midweek chicken traybake. He shows us cool ways to upgrade salmon, knocks up a shelf-raid quesadilla toastie, and transforms a batch-cook Bolognese into cheesy bread bowls. All finished off with a super simple banoffee tart.

programme.title: Jamie Oliver: Fast & Simple
programme.sub-title: Creamy Chicken Pot Pie and Chocolate Tiramisu
programme.desc: Jamie cooks a midweek traybake of roast veg and Camembert. He turns poached chicken into a creamy chicken & chive pie, serves up his easy green chilli salsa under sizzling butterflied prawns, and finishes it all off with decadent chocolate tiramisù.

programme.title: Jamie Oliver: Fast & Simple
programme.desc: Jamie shares a simple salmon dish perfect for a midweek meal, and some no-fuss fish cakes made from tins. He cooks a lamb Madras traybake, as well as a no-cook pasta sauce, and crowns it all off with a hot and crispy ice cream parcel!

programme.title: Jamie Oliver: Fast & Simple
programme.sub-title: Jarred Pepper Pasta and Sheet Pan Brisket
programme.desc: Jamie cooks a speedy jarred-pepper pasta, crispy chicken in baked-bread sauce, and a beef brisket traybake - all prepped in minutes. He makes shelf-raid spiced haricot beans, and rounds it all off with a fast and simple strawberry & balsamic tart.

programme.title: Jamie Oliver: Fast & Simple
programme.sub-title: Smash Burger and Creamy Chicken with Mushrooms
programme.desc: Jamie cooks a midweek meal of speedy sweet pea chicken, a juicy Smash burger and a chicken and mushroom rice traybake. He batch-cooks his seven-veg sauce, followed by a spicy fish soup. And finishes off with a perfect pudding of tinned fruit granita.
